kit.leader_skill: "DB Saga" Category Ki +4 and HP, ATK & DEF +150%

super_attack.name: Thrusting Blue Dragon Blade (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes colossal damage to enemy; Great chance of performing; a critical hit for 1 turn

ultra_super_attack.name: Devastating Dodon Ray (Extreme)
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; Great chance of performing; a critical hit for 1 turn

passive_skill.name: 20th Anniversary
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained; For every Ki Sphere obtained: ATK 56% up; DEF 48% up; 3 or more Ki Spheres obtained: ATK 75% up and DEF 64% up when attacking; When attacking with 10 or more Ki: ATK 108% up; When receiving an attack with 10 or more Ki: DEF 108% up; When HP is 50% or more: DEF 100% up; Damage reduction rate 20% up; Before receiving 3 attacks in battle: Damage reduction rate 20% up; When HP is 50% or less at the start of the character's attacking turn after the character receives 3 or more attacks in battle: (Once) Damage reduction rate 50% up; (Once) Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (STR excluded) to STR Ki Spheres; When activating the Active Skill: ATK 444% up temporarily and performs a critical hit

lines.text: Receives an additional Ki +2 per Ki Sphere obtained
ATK 75% up and DEF 64% up when attacking

lines.context: When attacking with 10 or more Ki
When receiving an attack with 10 or more Ki
When HP is 50% or less at the start of the character's attacking turn after the character receives 3 or more attacks in battle

lines.text: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (STR excluded) to STR Ki Spheres
lines.context: When HP is 50% or less at the start of the character's attacking turn after the character receives 3 or more attacks in battle

lines.text: ATK 444% up temporarily and performs a critical hit

active_skill.name: Last-Ditch Attempt
active_skill.effect: Massively raises ATK temporarily,; causes ultimate damage; Stuns the enemy for 1 turn
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when HP is 50% or less if the character receives an attack 3 or more times in battle (once only)
